name: Animal Companion
summary: You gain the service of a young animal companion (page 206) that travels with you on your adventures and obeys any simple commands you give it to the best of its abilities.

name: Animal Empathy (Druid)
summary: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level.

name: Fire Lung
summary: A lifetime of proximity to flames has inured your lungs and eyes to smoke.

name: Leshy Familiar
summary: You call a minor spirit of nature into a plant body, creating a leshy companion to aid you in your spellcasting.

name: Plant Empathy
summary: You have a connection to flora that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level.

name: Reach Spell
trait: Bard, Cleric, Concentrate, Druid, Oracle, Sorcerer, Spellshape, Witch, Wizard
summary: You can extend your spells’ range.

name: Shore Step
summary: The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered.

name: Steadying Stone
summary: The earth has taught you how to remain unyielding and firm.

name: Storm Born
summary: You are at home out in the elements, reveling in the power of nature unleashed.

name: Untamed Form
summary: You are one with the wild, always changing and adapting to meet any challenge.

name: Verdant Weapon
summary: You cultivate a seed that can sprout into a wooden staff, vine whip, or another weapon.

name: Widen Spell
trait: Druid, Manipulate, Oracle, Sorcerer, Spellshape, Witch, Wizard
summary: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

name: Call of the Wild
summary: You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid.

name: Enhanced Familiar
trait: Druid, Magus, Sorcerer, Thaumaturge, Witch, Wizard
summary: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Order Explorer
summary: You have learned the secrets of another druidic order, passing whatever rites of initiation that order requires and gaining access to its secrets.

name: Poison Resistance
summary: Your affinity for the natural world grants you protection against some of its dangers.

name: Anthropomorphic Shape
summary: Humanoids’ supposed place apart from animals is folly—taking on their forms just requires some extra practice.

name: Cryptic Spell
summary: You hide your magic in the croak of a frog, in the sway of the trees, in the howl of the wind, and the flicker of the will-o'-wisp.

name: Elemental Summons
summary: You can call the elements to you.

name: Fire Resistance
summary: Your connection to heat and flame means that fire is reluctant to bring its full force to bear against you.

name: Forest Passage
summary: You can always find a path, almost as if foliage parted before you.

name: Form Control
summary: With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate shape for a longer period of time.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 185</row>
trait: Bard, Champion, Cleric, Druid, Magus, Monk, Oracle, Psychic, Ranger, Sorcerer, Summoner, Uncommon, Witch, Wizard
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Leshy Familiar Secrets
summary: The leaf order’s secrets allow your familiar to take advantage of its leshy form.

name: Mature Animal Companion (Druid)
summary: Your animal companion has grown up over the course of your adventures, becoming a mature animal companion and gaining additional capabilities (page 211).

name: Natural Swimmer
summary: Water flows around you, letting you cut through the waves as if born to it.

name: Order Magic
summary: You have delved deeper into the teaching of a new order, gaining access to a coveted order spell.

name: Sheltering Cave
summary: You spend 10 minutes communing with spirits of earth and stone, requesting shelter.

name: Snowdrift Spell
summary: The howling wind and precipitation of your magic turn to thick snow.

name: Advanced Elemental Spell
prerequisite: flame order, stone order, storm order, or wave order
summary: Your connection to one of the great elemental aspects of nature deepens, allowing you further control over its powers.

name: Current Spell
summary: As you use your magic to manipulate air or water, you spin off some of its currents to form a barrier around you.

name: Grown of Oak
summary: You can make your skin take on the woody endurance of an ancient tree and have your familiar follow suit.

name: Insect Shape
summary: Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures.

name: Instinctive Support
summary: When you support your animal companion, your companion supports you in turn.

name: Steady Spellcasting
trait: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Oracle, Psychic, Sorcerer, Witch, Wizard
summary: You don’t lose spells easily. If a reaction would disrupt your spellcasting action, attempt a DC 15 flat check. If you succeed, your action isn’t disrupted.

name: Storm Retribution
summary: You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you.

name: Can't You See?
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism; Expert in Stealth
summary: The eye rebels, the mind recoils—no matter how much those who can see you try to explain what's there, their friends' gazes just skitter over you, like a bird afraid to land.

name: Deimatic Display
summary: Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing.

name: Eerie Environs
prerequisite: Trained in Intimidation; Trained in Stealth
summary: The natural world can be scary to those not used to it—and you make it scarier still.

name: Eerie Traces
prerequisite: Trained in Intimidation; Trained in Survival
summary: The tracks you leave behind are strange, somehow disconcerting and unnerving—they might travel backward, or through places no one would think to pass through.

name: Ferocious Shape
summary: You’ve mastered the shape of dinosaurs.

name: Fey Caller
summary: You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

name: Fiery Retort
summary: Ignoring your pain, you sear your attacker with a wave of flame.

name: Floral Restoration
summary: You request that nearby plants share their vitality with you to replenish your body and magic.

name: Forgotten Presence
summary: The world conspires to keep you forgotten and unnoticed— memories cloud, ink stains out your name in ledgers, and portraits of you crack and warp over your face.

name: Incredible Companion (Druid)
summary: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

name: Raise Menhir
summary: You raise a druidic monument, such as a standing stone or warding tree, from the ground, creating a powerful primal ward that blocks other types of magic.

name: Soaring Shape
summary: Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below.

name: Wind Caller
summary: You bid the winds to aid you, carrying you through the air and allowing you passage through the strongest headwinds.

name: Eerie Proclamation
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Curse, Druid, Linguistic, Manipulate, Necromancy, Primal, Ranger, Uncommon
prerequisite: Expert in Occultism; Expert in Survival
summary: You know there are places in the world that are just wrong— places where the birds don't sing and where you always feel like you're being watched.

name: Elemental Shape
summary: You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body and manifest as a living embodiment of those elements.

name: Harden Flesh
summary: You fortify your skin with minerals drawn from earth and stone.

name: Healing Transformation
summary: You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries.

name: Overwhelming Energy
summary: With a complex gesture, you call upon the primal power of your spell to overcome enemies’ resistances.

name: Plant Shape
summary: You can take the shape of a plant creature.

name: Primal Howl
summary: Your companion can let out a howl laced with your primal magic.

name: Pristine Weapon
summary: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures.

name: Side by Side (Druid)
summary: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance.

name: Thunderclap Spell
summary: Your lightning splits the air, generating a booming shock wave.

name: Dragon Shape
summary: You can take on the shape of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures.

name: Garland Spell
summary: If your next action is to Cast a Spell with the fungus or plant trait, a garland of plants grows in a 10-foot burst in the spell’s range.

name: Green Tongue
summary: You share a special kinship with all things green and living.

name: Necromantic Deflection
summary: You imbue your shield with life-giving energy to deflect harmful necromantic magic.

name: Pesh Skin
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 78</row>
summary: Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it.

name: Primal Focus
summary: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus.

name: Primal Summons
summary: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water.

name: Purifying Spell
summary: You purify the water within a creature's body to cleanse them of illness.

name: Wandering Oasis
summary: You’re surrounded by soothing energy.

name: Bizarre Transformation
summary: The forms you take on defy belief—chimerical sights of twisted antlers or acidic drool.

name: Reactive Transformation
prerequisite: Untamed Form; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
summary: You transform reflexively when in danger.

name: Sow Spell
summary: You fold your spell into a seed.

name: Specialized Companion (Druid)
summary: Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability.

name: Timeless Nature
summary: With primal magic sustaining you, you cease aging.

name: Verdant Metamorphosis
summary: You have turned into a plant version of yourself, gaining the plant trait and losing traits inappropriate for your new form (typically humanoid).

name: Effortless Concentration
trait: Bard, Druid, Sorcerer, Summoner, Witch, Wizard
summary: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

name: Impaling Briars
summary: You can fill an area with devastating briars.

name: Monstrosity Shape
summary: You can transform into a powerful magical creature.

name: Uplifting Winds
summary: The winds are eager to keep you aloft.

name: Invoke Disaster
summary: You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes.

name: Perfect Form Control
summary: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate shapes indefinitely.

name: Primal Aegis
summary: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy.

name: Primal Wellspring
summary: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring.

name: Apex Companion
summary: Gain the _apex companion_ focus spell.

name: Heart of the Kaiju
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 76</row>
summary: Witnessing the might of a kaiju up close awoke a new ferocity within you.

name: Hierophant's Power
summary: You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you.

name: Ley Line Conduit
summary: You can draw magic from the ley lines of the world.

name: True Shapeshifter
summary: You transcend the limitations of form.

name: Verdant Presence
summary: The life-giving properties of the _aeon orbs_ flourish within you.
